Class ConversionCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ConversionCalculator

  • public class ConversionCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is where all calculations in this program take place the new variable for type is not changed inside this program and must be updated outside the class

      • toCup

        public double toCup(double amount,
                    java.lang.String type)
        takes "tbsp" and converts the quantity to amount
        Parameters:
        amount - the numeric quantity of the recipe portion
        type - the unit of measurement, must be "tbsp" or it will not change the value
        Returns:
        the new amount as a "cup"

        type - the unit of measurement, must be "cup" or "tsp" or it will not change the value
        Returns:
        the new amount as a "tbsp"

      • applyMode

        public double applyMode(int mode,
                        double amount)
        Parameters:
        mode - takes an int to know whether to half, double, or triple the amount. 1 = halved, 2 = doubled, 3 = tripled
        amount - the numeric quantity of the recipe portion
        Returns:
        double amount as the new value after the recipe has been altered
